headline: UMS 3468 BBEES ¬´ Database on Biodiversity, Ecology, Environments and Societies‚Ä UMS 3468 BBEES was created in September 2011, by the CNRS Institute of Ecology and Environment (INEE), in collaboration with the National Museum of Natural History (MNHN Paris). It is hosted on the site of the Jardin des Plantes (MNHN Paris, 5e arr.) The mission of the UMS BBEES is to provide technical and scientific support (advice, but also practical assistance) for research units and researchers from CNRS-INEE and MNHN, wishing to structure, sustain or mutualize their databases on natural and cultural biodiversity. UMS BBEES is partner of several major programs: ANAEE France, but also French Long Term Ecological Research network (Zones ateliers; www.za-inee.org/ http://) and Human-Environment Observatories network (http://www.ohm-inee.cnrs.fr/).

La question de l‚Äôidentification et de l‚Äôaccessibilit√© des bases de donn√©es est √©galement au c≈ìur des pr√©occupations le l‚ÄôUMS BBEES, en particulier pour ce qui concerne les bases inactives (les bases de donn√©es d√©velopp√©es dans le cadre de programmes nationaux et stock√©es sur des ordinateurs personnels par exemple) et les bases en veille (bases de donn√©es accessibles, mais qui ne sont plus aliment√©es, ni exploit√©es).
